list.name: Finx
list.description: The owner of Starr Park's escape room, Finx is meant to help visitors complete tasks. Instead, he uses his time controlling abilities to cause mischief! Also, he LOVES cats.

Now part of Starr Park's maintenance team, Moe uses his special digging machine, Driller, to traverse the sewer tunnels... and also cause a bit of destruction throughout the park, much to Ash's dismay.

list.descriptionHtml: Frank is a good-natured giant who helps out at the mortuary by day and spins tunes at the Club by night. He doesn't get a lot of sleep, and it shows.

starPowers.name: Power Grab
starPowers.description: Frank steals the power of a Brawler he defeats, increasing his damage by x% for x seconds!
starPowers.descriptionHtml: Frank steals the power of a Brawler he defeats, increasing his damage by x% for x seconds!

starPowers.name: Sponge
starPowers.description: Frank gains +x health.
starPowers.descriptionHtml: Frank gains +x health.

gadgets.descriptionHtml: Frank clears any disabling effect on himself, and momentarily becomes immune to stuns, slows and knockbacks.

gadgets.descriptionHtml: Frank's next attack deals an extra x% damage and pulls opponents towards him.

list.name: Penny
list.description: Penny doesn't care about studying old maps or puzzling over sea shanty riddles. She's a pirate so she can blow stuff up and grab whatever she wants!
list.descriptionHtml: Penny doesn't care about studying old maps or puzzling over sea shanty riddles. She's a pirate so she can blow stuff up and grab whatever she wants!

starPowers.descriptionHtml: Penny's gold pouches burst with a x% wider cone after each hit.

starPowers.name: Master Blaster
starPowers.description: Penny's cannon deals x damage and knocks back nearby enemies on landing.
starPowers.descriptionHtml: Penny's cannon deals x damage and knocks back nearby enemies on landing.

gadgets.description: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.
gadgets.descriptionHtml: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.

gadgets.description: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.
gadgets.descriptionHtml: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.

list.name: Darryl
list.description: Darryl put on the pirate captain's hat in a bid to avoid work, but now he's forced to defend his ship! Who knew being in charge took actual effort?
list.descriptionHtml: Darryl put on the pirate captain's hat in a bid to avoid work, but now he's forced to defend his ship! Who knew being in charge took actual effort?

starPowers.descriptionHtml: After Barrel Roll all damage Darryl takes is reduced by x% for x seconds.

starPowers.description: When Darryl uses his Super, he doubles his reload speed for x seconds.
starPowers.descriptionHtml: When Darryl uses his Super, he doubles his reload speed for x seconds.

gadgets.description: Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals x damage and recharges his Super by x% if it hits enemies!
gadgets.descriptionHtml: Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals x damage and recharges his Super by x% if it hits enemies!

gadgets.descriptionHtml: Darryl creates a slowing area around himself for x seconds.

list.name: Tara
list.description: Tara has seen in the cards that great difficulties lie ahead! But don't despair... she has a terrific selection of magical trinkets for sale to help with that.
list.descriptionHtml: Tara has seen in the cards that great difficulties lie ahead! But don't despair... she has a terrific selection of magical trinkets for sale to help with that.

starPowers.descriptionHtml: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears to heal Tara and her teammates.

gadgets.descriptionHtml: Tara and her allies are able to see all enemies, even inside bushes, for x seconds.

gadgets.descriptionHtml: Tara surrounds herself with three weak shadows that attack opponents and disappear after x seconds.

list.name: Pam
list.description: Pam handles an enormous workload at the junkyard and always gets it done! It's just a shame it keeps her away from her daughter, Jessie...
list.descriptionHtml: Pam handles an enormous workload at the junkyard and always gets it done! It's just a shame it keeps her away from her daughter, Jessie...

starPowers.descriptionHtml: Whenever Pam hits enemy Brawlers with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for x health.

gadgets.descriptionHtml: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes x% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims x% of the ammo for herself.

list.name: Piper
list.description: Piper wants nothing more than to be the local village baker who hands out pies, cookies and other sweet treats! Just don't ask about her past.
list.descriptionHtml: Piper wants nothing more than to be the local village baker who hands out pies, cookies and other sweet treats! Just don't ask about her past.

starPowers.descriptionHtml: Piper's attack deals +x extra damage (at max range) when she's hidden in a bush.

starPowers.descriptionHtml: When Piper hits an opponent with her attack, she reloads x ammo instantly.

list.name: Bo
list.description: Bo has survived in the Rumble Jungle for a long time. It's all the more impressive considering he's been using toys he got on sale from the Gift Shop.
list.descriptionHtml: Bo has survived in the Rumble Jungle for a long time. It's all the more impressive considering he's been using toys he got on sale from the Gift Shop.

starPowers.descriptionHtml: Bo spots enemies hidden in bushes from x% longer distance than normally.

list.description: Poco believes music can change people's lives. He's so enthusiastic about it that he never stops playing, even after people ask him to!
list.descriptionHtml: Poco believes music can change people's lives. He's so enthusiastic about it that he never stops playing, even after people ask him to!

list.description: Crow trusts no one and keeps to himself. The most anyone knows about him is that he's often found at the diner, hanging out with Bull and Bibi.

list.description: Brock is a smack-talking video game enthusiast. His big attitude hides a more introverted personality, but he'll still do whatever it takes to win!
list.descriptionHtml: Brock is a smack-talking video game enthusiast. His big attitude hides a more introverted personality, but he'll still do whatever it takes to win!
